abstract: Increasing its bet on biotechnology, Sanofi-Aventis said it would pay an additional $1 billion over eight years to Regeneron Pharmaceuticals for the discovery of new drugs.
snippet: Increasing its bet on biotechnology, Sanofi-Aventis said it would pay an additional $1 billion over eight years to Regeneron Pharmaceuticals for the discovery of new drugs.
lead_paragraph: Increasing its bet on biotechnology, Sanofi-Aventis said it would pay an additional $1 billion over eight years to Regeneron Pharmaceuticals for the discovery of new drugs.

headline.main: Sanofi Taps Biotech Firm to Help Pipeline
